attributes.action: Allow cannabis to be sold over the counter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are lots of good reason why Cannabis should be allowed to be sold over the counter in licenced premises & like alcohol nobody would be forced to buy it.

Doesnt the uk (if not the whole world) have more to worry about these than somebody smoking a few joints in the privacy of their own home.

rejection.details: Could you remove the url and reference to your website, since we can't publicise commercial sites
reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
